synopsis.text: Special Unit Constable Kazuki Fuse is haunted by the image of a young suicide bomber, a member of a terrorist group known as "The Sect," after he hesitates to shoot her during a mission in an alternate post-WWII Tokyo. As a result, Fuse is forced to undergo retraining and finds himself entangled in a complex web of power struggles between the Capital Police and local forces. Amidst this chaos, Fuse encounters the sister of the very girl he saw die, leading to an unusual relationship that challenges his loyalties and beliefs. As Fuse navigates this dangerous world of civil unrest, government conspiracies, and moral dilemmas, he must determine where his true allegiance lies and what it truly means to be human.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
